short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension tells you the current weather of your location with the help of navigator api available in chrome browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a weather extension that tells you the current weather of your location. It takes the permission of your current location using the navigator API and then displays the weather details of the location.
Just provide the permission once and you will always see the weather of your location whenever you click the extension.

* You may use the following commands to activate the extension
 Ctrl + Shift + X    (For windows)
 Cmd + Shift + X  (For macOS)
